Key Match Events: South Africa beat Sri Lanka by six wickets with 22 balls to spare
Sri Lanka dismissed for 77 all out from 19.1 overs
Post-Match Reflections: Aiden Markram: 'Happy with the win. Credit for what we did in the field but the batting was a bit up and down.'
Anrich Nortje: 'Just to get some momentum going, we've worked really hard and it's great to get a result.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch was quite tough for batting
Others: The match was a Group D opener in New York
Alex Hartley, former England bowler on BBC Test Match Special, expressed concerns about the game of the tournament - India v Pakistan - if it's played on this surface.
